channel.title: A Couple Sloppy Graphics I Made
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oylSauo.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pS1uJGJ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tKCJxaD.jpg[/img]
Constructive criticism is appreciated, but please don't be too harsh with me. I know that each and every one of these are very sloppy and could use a load of work. I rushed through all three of these.

item.title: A Couple Sloppy Graphics I Made

@Host_Gushers wrote:

All In All, Nice Job

item.title: A Couple Sloppy Graphics I Made
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:2, topic:520772”]You Think These Are Sloppy? Probably Better Than What 95% Of The Community Can Make.

Two Suggestion Tho: In The Last One Make The Text A Bit Darker, You Cant Really See The Last Letter. Last Thing Is That All Of You Graphics Have The Same Line Effect On Them, Try Changing It? What I Mean: http://prntscr.com/18avbb The Red Lines Are What I’m Talking About.[/quote]Yes I do think these are sloppy. The focal point was rather skimmed through, the depth lacks character, the lighting is a little displaced. On the second one - there’s too much openness going about and it’s kind of plain. The third one, as you said, could have been a bit darker. The first one could have used a better focal point, the rendered slightly more to the left, the depth more in-depth, and that splash of yellow at the bottom right is unnecessary.

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:520772”]Holy love you still exist. Nice job, man.[/quote]Thank you. I have been actively posting for a couple days now. I plan to be more active. I’m no longer participating in RuneScape emulation, though I am going to be actively posting in the general boards, and lurking in all the rest.

Read full topic
item.source: A Couple Sloppy Graphics I Made
